plays.text: Goal scored by Kristian Huselius assisted by Pavel Trnka and Niklas Hagman
Goal scored by Chris Taylor assisted by Norm Milley and Eric Boulton
Penalty to Olli Jokinen 2 minutes for Hooking Curtis Brown
Penalty to Alexei Zhitnik 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Pavel Trnka 2 minutes for Tripping Eric Boulton
Penalty to Olli Jokinen 2 minutes for Hooking Daniel Briere
Goal scored by Daniel Briere assisted by Miroslav Satan and Jochen Hecht
Penalty to Ivan Novoseltsev 2 minutes for Tripping Jason Botterill
Penalty to Rory Fitzpatrick 2 minutes for Holding Denis Shvidki
